solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int fourSumCount(int[] A, int[] B, int[] C, int[] D) {--newline--        Map<Integer,Integer> sums = new HashMap<>();--newline--        int count = 0;--newline--        for(int i=0; i<A.length;i++) {--newline--            for(int j=0;j<B.length;j++){--newline--                int sum = A[i]+B[j];--newline--                if(sums.containsKey(sum)) {--newline--                    sums.put(sum, sums.get(sum)+1);--newline--                } else {--newline--                    sums.put(sum, 1);--newline--                }--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        for(int k=0; k<A.length;k++) {--newline--            for(int z=0;z<C.length;z++){--newline--                int sum = -(C[k]+D[z]);--newline--                if(sums.containsKey(sum)) {--newline--                    count+=sums.get(sum);--newline--                }--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        return count;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
